entry.p: Embedded in this screed on phishing, I found this little gem:

blockquote.p: As it happens my take on the whole RIAA thing is to stop buying CDs and learn the guitar.

entry.p: My philosophy exactly, which is why I make my own damn music (as yet unrecorded, though...).
Predictably, my take on phishing is, yet again, abandon email and use an IM system in which people can't spoof 'from' addresses. Jabber, anyone?
